title: Back to School Bash
description: An event to prepare students for the school year with supplies and resources.

title: Autumn Arts Festival
description: A festival celebrating local artists with food stalls and live performances.

title: Halloween Spooktacular
description: A Halloween event with costume contests, games, and spooky stories.

title: Holiday Gift Fair
description: Shop unique holiday gifts from local vendors and enjoy seasonal treats.

title: Winter Robotics Expo
description: Showcase of robotics projects and competitions with workshops and demonstrations.

title: Spring Fling
description: A spring celebration with games, music, and outdoor activities for the whole family.

title: Summer Robotics Camp
description: A week-long camp for aspiring engineers to learn robotics and programming.
